Bugbee's Blades & Brews.description:
The clanging of hammers and the scent of freshly-forged steel greet you as you approach "Bugbee's Blades & Brews." 
A weathered sign hangs above the door, depicting a fierce, axe-wielding half-orc. 
You've heard that Bugbee might be one of the best (and kindest) blacksmiths in Brightwood!
